item.title: Against Technical Debt
item.description: As a product owner and development leader, I often hear that “we have to pay our technical debt” in order to proceed with our product plan. As the metaphor goes, when you choose to take shortcuts now, you incur a debt that you’ll eventually have to repay with interest. The implication when a developer raises it is that those interest payments are too high and are preventing us from moving forward as effectively as we should.
